bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhang li 瘴癘 , miasmatic epidemic. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 10: 假令本有 冷，今得溫瘴，雖暴壯熱煩滿，視寒正須溫藥汗之 , “If [the patient] originally was affected by cold, and now [in addition] is affected by warmth miasma , even if the heat is violent with vexation and a feeling of fullness, one must [nevertheless] keep the cold in mind and it is appropriate to apply warming medication to cause sweating”.
